snippet: KAUFMAN--Robert. The governors, members and staff of The Real Estate Board of New York mourn the passing of Robert Kaufman, former REBNY governor, prominent builder and distinguished philanthropist. We express our sincere condolences to his wife Florence, his daughters Ronna, Cathy and Julie, and the entire Kaufman family as well as his colleagues at Sage Realty. Rob Speyer, Chairman John Banks, President 1/3
lead_paragraph: KAUFMAN--Robert. The governors, members and staff of The Real Estate Board of New York mourn the passing of Robert Kaufman, former REBNY governor, prominent builder and distinguished philanthropist. We express our sincere condolences to his wife Florence, his daughters Ronna, Cathy and Julie, and the entire Kaufman family as well as his colleagues at Sage Realty. Rob Speyer, Chairman John Banks, President 1/3
